messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Doctor's Base Mu, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a whoop of squeaking things have descended into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Kristina Houston. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Doctor's Base Mu have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Doctor's Base Mu's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Kristina Houston. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Doctor's Base Mu, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Did you not witness? I reflected the bullets with my hands.
